Use installed signatures Always use signatures from already installed apps when installing.\nThis is extremely dangerous.\nOnly enable when really needed! Show notification importance Show notification importance settings which are hidden in MIUI 12 and later versions Show entry for Notification history & log in Notification & Control center Google settings are displayed in the system settings Install unknown app permissions without searching the application list Use the international build, jump directly to the permission switch of the corresponding application ‚Äúdisplayed on top of other applications‚Äù Displayed in the upper-level authorized roll-free application list Unlock Taplus Enable High-Precision Location Services Unlock full-screen optimization Unlock mechanical keyboard Add Gboard as a customized input method for Xiaomi Keep the screen always on for OLED devices New NFC Page After opening, the default payment application for unsupported models cannot select Xiaomi Wallet New novelty haptic Page Unlock for non-Mi13Pro Show speed mode Can find speed mode in Developer options Unlock network call assistant Show Vip Service Display Tablet Section Unlock Top Battery Style Customize color of top bar battery
*Remove OTA validate [LAB] - Only support VAB series use, please do not open other series.\n- No need for internal testing qualification to flash into the full internal testing package.\n- Those who have internal testing permission will not be able to receive internal testing updates, and can be used to block system updates.\n- After cross-version type upgrade, it is recommended to clear data.\n- Unofficial ROM usage is not supported.

Unlock Play video sound with screen of and Turn off screen Anywhere MEMC Anywhere Enhance Contours Anywhere Super Resolution Anywhere Sight Anywhere Macro Combo Beautify for video calls Privacy Camera FocusFrame Front camera assistant Display screen power consumption information on battery ranking At the same time, the hidden power consumption information of all other apps will also be displayed Remove conversation bubble settings restriction You can manage which apps can show conversation bubbles in \"System settings - Additional settings - Floating windows - Conversation bubbles - Manage conversation bubbles\" Try to fix conversation bubbles Try to re-enable conversation bubbles service Game Turbo Enhanced visuals Dynamic Performance Enhanced audio Wi-Fi optimization Optimized touch controls Show Ai Subtitles on Video Toolbox Show custom frame rate in the game\'s custom settings Reject VoLTE calls to SIM cards without data service\n->\nDon\'t disconnect for calls Smart discharge protection

Enable AOSP Open/Share Sheet Allow all apps to use Dark Mode However, this forced Dark Mode in MIUI may not be applicable to all apps\nSome apps, such as system apps, will still be excluded Allow screenshot Allow screenshot in software that does not allow to\nSupport adding drop-down quick setting on Control center for security Remove display over notification Remove \"This app is displaying over other apps\" notification Force small windows Ignore system blacklist and software prohibition of small windows Max wallpaper scale The wallpaper zoom magnification when the system desktop switch is applied Allow untrusted touches(It is not necessary to open on A13) Kill domain verification Prevents the system (and also yourself) from allowing apps to always open supported links.\nIt also enables you to open supported links in apps which are not "verified" on Android 12 and above. Unlocked multi freeform number limit Disable the verification of lock screen password every 72 hours Media volume steps Turning on may cause the scrolling of the volume bar to freeze or the Bluetooth volume to be abnormal
Always display Home screen clock When turned on, the clock will not be hidden on the status bar even if there is a clock widget Double tap to sleep Double-tap the blank space to sleep Disable wallpaper dimming This will disable the effect that the wallpaper will gradually brighten from dimming when going in and out of the recent task Modify the card marking animation Modify the animation effect of the recent task removal card Add freeform shortcut Add multi-instance Swap Positions of freeform and multi-instance Customize shortcut menu title Display All Apps in Desktop Shortcut Management Restore google app icon Scroll app name The application name that is too long will be scrolled and displayed without any new line Show Real Use and Total Memory Hacking fake MIUI memory Display Memory Status on Tablet Devices Restore Some Settings and Dock Blur for Tablet Devices Add startup animation to all widgets Show MIUI widgets on the Classic widgets page Resizable miui widgets Remove restrictions on shortcuts Remove icon number restriction from dock Optimize unlock anim Medium icon round corner follow Unlock launcher icon grids Remove fake gesture guide line from landscape multitasking interface This will also restore the display of the genuine gesture guide line Fake non-default icon Enable perfect icons Show the Hide Gesture Guide for Pad System apps can be shared Quick app switching Using the full width of the folder view Number of rows of icons in the folder view
Remove device restrictions It will be recognized as high-end by default. Turning this option on will not increase GPU performance overhead. Remove some logs at the same time. Complete blur Use the official half-finished complete blur feature Complete Blur Complement Complements blur when swiping up from the App, which may cause visual flicker Resume recent blur Example for MiPad6 Always blur launcher wallpaper Folder View Blur Enable Blur When Open Folder Download Animation

Custom animation speed Set the animation speed in different scenarios separately Transition animation speed„ÄåWhen the app is turned on or off„Äç The speed of the transition animation that takes effect when the application is opened and closed Transition animation speed„ÄåIn and out of the background„Äç The speed of the transition animation that takes effect when entering and exiting the most recent task

StatusBar Show about Battery Charging display only, refresh rate is determined by the system StatusBar Always Show about Battery Hide status bar when taking a screenshot Status bar battery text color Enable custom battery text color Considering the inversion of the system, please do not customize it to black or white.\nOtherwise, you will not be able to see the information on some pages because of the reverse color. Status bar battery text size Add status bar battery line spacing Status bar battery line spacing multiplier Status bar battery left padding Status bar battery right padding Status bar battery top padding Status bar battery bottom padding Status bar battery left margin Status bar battery right margin Status bar battery top margin Status bar battery bottom margin
Show Wifi Standard Force to use new HD icon A recent system version is required, some models may not have been updated Display small HD icon when connected to Wi-Fi\nDisplay new HD icon when not connected to Wi-Fi Battery percentage font size Make most notifications can be slide to small window Some notifications through Mi Push may not be supported. Remove white list for notification settings Redirect notification setting to channel setting Opening settings from notification menu leads to channel settings instead of app\'s common notification settings Hide the notification settings icon Restore NearBy Share tile Disable bluetooth temporarily off Turn off bluetooth completely in control center Restore old version of Control Center Clock display seconds Interface clock uses system fonts Interface date uses system fonts Blur button Remove the lock screen side panel Remove the lock screen camera feature Hide Zen Mode notification on lock screen Hide unlock hint at the bottom of the lock screen Control flashlight with right swipe on lock screen Trigger flashlight with the bottom left button on lock screen Remove Only Left Swipe on Lock Screen This will keep the button in the bottom-left corner of the lock screen but disable the left-to-right swipe Enable wave charge animation Display current information during charging The current unit uses mA No need to enter password when power on The phone is not encrypted to take effect
